data.title: McCormack Baron Salazar
data.meta_description: Innovators in community development and urban revitalization, McCormack Baron Salazar is the nation’s leading for-profit developer, manager and asset manager of economically-integrated urban neighborhoods.
data.text:
MBS Urban Initiatives CDE receives $60 million New Markets Tax Credit Allocation

The additional allocation will be invested in projects that provide employment, services and access to fresh, healthy foods in disadvantaged urban neighborhoods.

Read More

McCormack Baron Salazar names five new senior level executives

The firm is pleased to announce the appointment of five senior level executives, expanding the company’s depth and reach across the country.

Read More

McCormack Baron Salazar names Adhi Nagraj Senior Vice President and Director of Development, Bay Area

Nagraj will serve as a market leader and drive further opportunities for transformative mixed-income housing in the Bay Area. He will be responsible for managing the San Francisco office and a diverse team of internal and external finance, design, construction and legal professionals, as well as collaborating with external partners, clients and community stakeholders.

Read More

McCormack Baron Salazar names Adi Shamir-Baron Vice President of Design

Shamir-Baron will coordinate with the design team on early conceptual designs to articulate design goals, define challenges and identify opportunities to enhance the built environment through design, including advancing template unit designs, creating sustainable and resilient building designs, incorporating green infrastructure and preserving historic assets.

Read More

McCormack Baron Salazar names Pam Askew Senior Vice President of Development

Askew has more than 28 years’ of experience in affordable housing and finance. She will oversee company projects in multiple markets around the country.

Read More

McCormack Baron Salazar names Tom Currell Senior Vice President of Development

Currell will work with the company’s Bay Area team on projects in development and pre-development, and will identify new opportunities in the Mountain and Southwest regions. Currell returns to McCormack Baron Salazar after two previous stints with the company.

Read More

McCormack Baron Salazar names Jerry Stone Director of Design and Construction

Stone has more than 20 years of experience in development and construction. As Director of Design and Construction, he will direct and coordinate activities of the architectural staff and construction administrators to ensure that design concepts meet corporate and community-specific goals for quality, cost and completion time.

Read More

Residents of Alice Griffith to celebrate Earth Day with Spring Cleanup event.

"Recycling Ambassadors" are hosting an event to help residents clean up, clean out, reduce, reuse and recycle.

Renaissance Square Opens

New mixed-income affordable housing community in Puerto Rico now open in San Juan’s Central Business District. McCormack Baron Salazar in partnership with the Puerto Rico Department of Housing debuts Renaissance Square, a new, vibrant, mixed-income community.

Groundbreaking held at new, resilent community in Caguas, Puerto Rico

McCormack Baron Salazar, in partnership with the Puerto Rico Department of Housing, celebrates the groundbreaking of the first housing development to use HUD Disaster Recovery funds. The new $130 million mixed-income, affordable, multi-generational housing begins construction in the Barrio Turabo neighborhood in the City of Caguas in Puerto Rico.
